name: LEGIRION 0.0.6: RECEPTACLE
description:
Here's the sixth public demo of my game LEGIRION.

In this version, I allowed the zooming to be any value, and I hope it doesn't look too bad. I also added in some receptacles, that can store items. These basically expand your inventory, while also decreasing your usable inventory. I also made the monsters drop some items, which are currently useless and will be changed in the future.

LEGIRION is a game heavily inspired by Old School Runescape. It is very much a work in progress.
